full_summary:
**Night Vision Goggles / Spare Parts Tender Notice**
=============================================

**Title**
--------

The Department of National Defence has issued a tender notice for the procurement of Night Vision Goggles / Spare Parts. The required items include:

*   **Item 1: Regulating Valve**: 10 units, NSN 01-549-7417, delivery to 25 CSFD Montreal by March 31, 2025
*   **Item 2: Shelf Assembly**: 40 units, NSN 01-444-3376, delivery to 25 CSFD Montreal by March 31, 2025
*   **Item 3: Printed Circuit Board**: 45 units, NSN 01-258-2950, delivery to 25 CSFD Montreal by March 31, 2025
*   **Item 4: Image Intensifier Housing**: 50 units, NSN 01-442-6412, delivery to 25 CSFD Montreal by March 31, 2025

**Note**
------

Due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service instead of traditional methods.

**Procurement Details**
--------------------

*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

**Contracting Entity**
-------------------

The Contracting Entity is the Department of National Defence.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

*   **Name**: Dany Lebel
*   **Email**: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: (000) 000-0000
*   **Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, Canada K1A 0K2

**Tender Submission Details**
-----------------------------

Bidders can download the tender documentation from the Government of Canada website.

**Required Documents**
----------------------

*   Tender submission form
*   Bidder profile sheet
*   Certificate of incorporation (if applicable)
*   Proof of payment (if applicable)

**Tender Evaluation Criteria**
-------------------------------

The tender evaluation will be based on the lowest price criterion.

**Important Dates**
-------------------

*   **Publication Date**: November 21, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: January 7, 2025,
